name: VS. Excitebike
description:
Fans love the Excitebike game for its frenetic races, high stakes, and sweet jumps. And now, for the first time, the Famicom disk version of VS. Excitebike is here—complete with 2-player split screen! Create tracks from 20 classic Excitebike track parts, and go for a best time or take on friends. Racing is more exciting when the rivalries are real.

Think you really know Excitebike? Try out the enhanced single-player mode in VS. Excitebike. It adds new tracks, a new soundtrack, and the ability to save your high score! Find out if you have what it takes to beat the best in the ultimate version of Shigeru Miyamoto’s Excitebike.

* Additional accessories required for multiplayer mode. Sold separately.

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
